CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: P3 and P4 with weak electron - deficient unit 2,2 0 -bithiazole exhibit similar HOMO / LUMO levels to homopolymer P6 , while the stronger electronaccepting unit benzo [c][1,2,5]thiadiazole reduced the LUMO by 0.28 eV.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| 2,2-bithiazole |
| benzo[c][1,2,5]thiadiazole |
| P3 and P4 with weak electron-deficient unit 2,2-bithiazole |
| P6 |

Note that I have presented the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

I have removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Material Name":

* "P3 and P4 with weak electron-deficient unit 2,2-bithiazole" - This is a description of a specific material, rather than a material name itself.
* "P6" - This is also a description of a specific material, rather than a material name.
